name: Poppie
description: I have held on tightly to the hope that this blessing will be bestowed upon me,to find that one special lady or we say sometimes “Beloved partner in life” with whom i can share everything, unite my heart, body and soul. That one special lady who will cherish and respect me with my imperfections as much as i will always cherish and respect her. That one special lady who things of me as her Prince. This would be a dream come true.
